approaches.title: Dynamic Programming: Top Down
approaches.blurb: Break the required amount into smaller amounts and reuse saved results to quickly find the final result.

approaches.title: Dynamic Programming: Bottom Up
approaches.blurb: Start from the available coins and calculate the amounts that can be made from them.

approaches.title: Recursive
approaches.blurb: Use recursion to recursively find the most efficient change for a given amount.
